018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.report;
019
020import static java.lang.Math.abs;
021import static java.nio.file.Files.writeString;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.knowm.xchart.VectorGraphicsEncoder.VectorGraphicsFormat.SVG;
024import static org.knowm.xchart.VectorGraphicsEncoder.saveVectorGraphic;
025import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH1;
026import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH2;
027import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.HIGH3;
028import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.LOW;
029import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.NORMAL;
030import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.NORMAL_HIGH;
031import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.OPTIMAL;
032import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.HTML;
033import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat.HTML_EMBEDDED;
034import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ReportBase.DestinationType.DEST_FILE;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.CAPTION;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.TXT;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.UTF8;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
039
040import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
041import java.io.File;
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.sql.SQLException;
044import java.time.Duration;
045import java.time.LocalDate;
046import java.time.LocalDateTime;
047import java.util.ArrayList;
048import java.util.Date;
049import java.util.HashMap;
050import java.util.List;
051import java.util.Map;
052import java.util.SortedMap;
053import java.util.stream.Stream;
054
055import org.apiguardian.api.API;
056import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.DataNode;
057import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis;
058import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.ReportFormat;
059import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ChartTheme;
060import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ReportBase;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnsupportedEnumError;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Template;
064
065/**
066 *  An implementation of
067 *  {@link org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Report}
068 *  that provides a report comparing the last two full quarters.
069 *
070 *  @version $Id: CompareReport.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $
071 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
072 *  @UMLGraph.link
073 *  @since 0.0.1
074 */
075@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CompareReport.java 151 2022-03-15 20:39:31Z tquadrat $" )
076@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
077public final class CompareReport extends ReportBase
078{
079        /*--------------*\
080    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
081        \*--------------*/
082    /**
083     *  Creates a new instance of {@code CompareReport}.
084     */
085    public CompareReport()
086    {
087        super( "COMPARE", HTML, HTML_EMBEDDED );
088    }   //  CompareReport()
089
090        /*---------*\
091    ====** Methods **==========================================================
092        \*---------*/
093    /**
094     *  Collects the data for one quarter.
095     *
096     *  @param  contents    The target for the collected data.
097     *  @param  quarter The number of the quarter to process. 0 is the current
098     *      quarter, -1 is the last quarter before the current, and so on.
099     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when creating the chart.
100     *  @throws SQLException    A problem was encountered when retrieving the
101     *      data from the database.
102     */
103    private final void collectQuarterData( final Map<String,String> contents, final int quarter ) throws IOException, SQLException
104    {
105        //---* Calculate the start and end date *------------------------------
106        final var today = LocalDate.now( getConfiguration().getClock() );
107        final var currentYear = today.getYear();
108        final var currentQuarterBegin = LocalDate.of( currentYear, (today.getMonthValue() - 1) / 3 * 3 + 1, 1 );
109        final var start = currentQuarterBegin.plusMonths( quarter * 3L );
110        final var end = start.plusMonths( 3L ).minusDays( 1L );
111
112        //---* Get the data *--------------------------------------------------
113        final SortedMap<LocalDateTime,DataNode> totalData;
114        try( final var connection = getConfiguration().retrieveConnection() )
115        {
116            totalData = loadData( connection, getConfiguration().getTimezone(), start, end );
117        }
118        final var numberOfMeasuring = totalData.size();
119        final SortedMap<LocalDate,DataNode> data = compressToDay( totalData );
120        final Map<Diagnosis,DistributionNode> distribution = distributeData( totalData );
121
122        final var firstDay = data.firstKey();
123        final var lastDay = data.lastKey();
124        final var duration = Duration.between( firstDay.atStartOfDay(), lastDay.plusDays( 1 ).atStartOfDay() );
125        final var totalDays = duration.toDays();
126        final var dayCount = data.size();
127
128        final var average = calculateAverage( data );
129        final var weightedAverage = calculateEndWeightedAverage( data );
130        final var median = calculateMedian( data );
131
132        //---* Create the chart *----------------------------------------------
133        final var width = 400;
134        final var height = width / 5 * 3;
135        final var theme = new ChartTheme();
136        final var chart = new org.knowm.xchart.XYChart( width, height, theme );
137        final var categories = new ArrayList<Date>();
138        final var systolicValues = new ArrayList<Integer>();
139        final var diastolicValues = new ArrayList<Integer>();
140        for( final var entry : totalData.entrySet() )
141        {
142            categories.add( new Date( entry.getKey().atZone( getConfiguration().getTimezone() ).toInstant().toEpochMilli() ) );
143            final var node = entry.getValue();
144            systolicValues.add( Integer.valueOf( node.systolic() ) );
145            diastolicValues.add( Integer.valueOf( node.diastolic() ) );
146        }
147        final var diastolicSeries = chart.addSeries( retrieveText( TXT, "Diastolic" ), categories, diastolicValues );
148        diastolicSeries.setSmooth( true );
149        final var systolicSeries = chart.addSeries( retrieveText( TXT, "Systolic" ), categories, systolicValues );
150        systolicSeries.setSmooth( true );
151        final var outputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
152        saveVectorGraphic( chart, outputStream, SVG );
153
154        //---* Gather the contents *-------------------------------------------
155        final var q = abs( quarter );
156        contents.put( format( "Q%d_FirstDay", q ), firstDay.toString() );
157        contents.put( format( "Q%d_LastDay", q ), lastDay.toString() );
158        contents.put( format( "Q%d_TotalDays", q ), format( "% 4d", totalDays ) );
159        contents.put( format( "Q%d_DayCount", q ), format( "% 4d", dayCount ) );
160        contents.put( format( "Q%d_TotalCount", q ), format( "% 4d", numberOfMeasuring ) );
161        contents.put( format( "Q%d_AverageSystolic", q ), format( "% 3d", average.systolic() ) );
162        contents.put( format( "Q%d_AverageDiastolic", q ), format( "% 3d", average.diastolic() ) );
163        contents.put( format( "Q%d_AveragePulsePressure", q ), format( "% 3d", average.pulsePressure() ) );
164        contents.put( format( "Q%d_AverageAssessment", q ), assessData( average ).toString() );
165        contents.put( format( "Q%d_WeightedAverageSystolic", q ), format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.systolic() ) );
166        contents.put( format( "Q%d_WeightedAverageDiastolic", q ), format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.diastolic() ) );
167        contents.put( format( "Q%d_WeightedAveragePulsePressure", q ), format( "% 3d", weightedAverage.pulsePressure() ) );
168        contents.put( format( "Q%d_WeightedAverageAssessment", q ), assessData( weightedAverage ).toString() );
169        contents.put( format( "Q%d_MedianSystolic", q ), format( "% 3d", median.systolic() ) );
170        contents.put( format( "Q%d_MedianDiastolic", q ), format( "% 3d", median.diastolic() ) );
171        contents.put( format( "Q%d_MedianPulsePressure", q ), format( "% 3d", median.pulsePressure() ) );
172        contents.put( format( "Q%d_MedianAssessment", q ), assessData( median ).toString() );
173        contents.put( format( "Q%d_Chart", q ), outputStream.toString( UTF8 ) );
174
175        for( final var diag : List.of( LOW, OPTIMAL, NORMAL, NORMAL_HIGH, HIGH1, HIGH2, HIGH3 ) )
176        {
177            final var node = distribution.computeIfAbsent( diag, DistributionNode::new );
178            contents.put( format( "Q%d_Diag_%s_SystolicPercent", q, diag.name() ), format( "% 5.1f%%", node.getSystolicPercentage() ) );
179            contents.put( format( "Q%d_Diag_%s_SystolicCount", q, diag.name() ), format( "% 4d", node.getSystolicCount() ) );
180            contents.put( format( "Q%d_Diag_%s_DiastolicPercent", q, diag.name() ), format( "% 5.1f%%", node.getDiastolicPercentage() ) );
181            contents.put( format( "Q%d_Diag_%s_DiastolicCount", q, diag.name() ), format( "% 4d", node.getDiastolicCount() ) );
182        }
183    }   //  collectQuarterData()
184
185    /**
186     *  {@inheritDoc}
187     */
188    @Override
189    public final void generateReport( final File destination, final ReportFormat format ) throws IOException, SQLException
190    {
191        //---* Get the data *--------------------------------------------------
192        final Map<String,String> contents = new HashMap<>();
193        for( var i = 0; i < 2; ++i ) collectQuarterData( contents, -i );
194
195        //---* Gather the contents *-------------------------------------------
196        contents.put( "Language", getConfiguration().getLocale().getLanguage() );
197        contents.put( "Headline", retrieveText( TXT, "Headline" ) );
198        contents.put( "Name", getConfiguration().getName() );
199        contents.put( "Birthdate", getConfiguration().getBirthdate().toString() );
200        contents.put( "NameCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Name" ) );
201        contents.put( "CreationDate", LocalDate.now( getConfiguration().getClock() ).toString() );
202        contents.put( "CreationCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Created" ) );
203        contents.put( "Q1", retrieveText( TXT, "PreviousQuarter" ) );
204        contents.put( "Q0", retrieveText( TXT, "CurrentQuarter" ) );
205        contents.put( "FirstDayCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "FirstDay" ) );
206        contents.put( "LastDayCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "LastDay" ) );
207        contents.put( "TotalDaysCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "TotalDays" ) );
208        contents.put( "DayCountCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DayCount" ) );
209        contents.put( "TotalCountCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "TotalCount" ) );
210        contents.put( "TableHeader", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader" ) );
211        contents.put( "TableHeader1", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader1" ) );
212        contents.put( "TableHeader2", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader2" ) );
213        contents.put( "TableHeader3", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader3" ) );
214        contents.put( "TableHeader4", retrieveText( TXT, "TableHeader4" ) );
215        contents.put( "AverageCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Average" ) );
216        contents.put( "WeightedAverageCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "WeightedAverage" ) );
217        contents.put( "MedianCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Median" ) );
218        contents.put( "DistributionCaption", retrieveText( CAPTION, "Distribution" ) );
219        contents.put( "DistributionColumn1Header", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DistributionColumn1" ) );
220        contents.put( "DistributionColumn2Header", retrieveText( CAPTION, "DistributionColumn2" ) );
221        contents.put( "Disclaimer", retrieveText( TXT, "Disclaimer" ) );
222
223        final var maxLenDiagnosisText = Stream.of( LOW, OPTIMAL, NORMAL, NORMAL_HIGH, HIGH1, HIGH2, HIGH3 )
224            .map( Diagnosis::toString )
225            .mapToInt( String::length )
226            .max()
227            .orElse( 0 );
228        final var diagFormat = format( "%%%ds", maxLenDiagnosisText );
229        contents.put( "Diag_Filler", " ".repeat( maxLenDiagnosisText ) );
230
231        for( final var diag : List.of( LOW, OPTIMAL, NORMAL, NORMAL_HIGH, HIGH1, HIGH2, HIGH3 ) )
232        {
233            contents.put( format( "Diag_%s", diag.name() ), format( diagFormat, diag.toString() ) );
234        }
235
236        //---* Create the output *---------------------------------------------
237        switch( format )
238        {
239            case HTML, HTML_EMBEDDED -> generateHTMLReport( destination, contents );
240            default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( format );
241        }
242    }   //  generateReport()
243
244    /**
245     *  Generates the report in
246     *  {@link ReportFormat#HTML}
247     *  or
248     *  {@link ReportFormat#HTML_EMBEDDED}
249     *  format.
250     *
251     *  @param destination  The output file.
252     *  @param contents The map with the report data.
253     *  @throws IOException An error occurred while writing to the destination.
254     */
255    private final void generateHTMLReport( final File destination, final Map<String,String> contents ) throws IOException
256    {
257        final var targetFile = checkDestination( destination, DEST_FILE );
258        final var template = new Template(
259            """
260                <!DOCTYPE html>
261                <html lang="${Language}">
262                  <head>
263                    <meta charset="utf-8">
264                    <title>${Headline} ${NameCaption} ${Name} (${Birthdate})</title>
265                  </head>
266                  <body>
267                  <h1>${Headline}</h1>
268                  <p>${NameCaption} <b>${Name}</b> (${Birthdate})</p>
269                  <p>${CreationCaption} <b>${CreationDate}</b></p>
270                  <hr>
271                  <table border = "1">
272                    <thead>
273                      <tr>
274                        <th width="30%"/>
275                        <th width="35%"
276                            align="center"
277                            colspan="4">${Q1}</th>
278                        <th width="35%"
279                            align="center"
280                            colspan="4">${Q0}</th>
281                      </tr>
282                    </thead>
283                    <tbody>
284                      <tr>
285                        <th align="right">${FirstDayCaption}</th>
286                        <td align="center"
287                            colspan="4">${Q1_FirstDay}</td>
288                        <td align="center"
289                            colspan="4">${Q0_FirstDay}</td>
290                      </tr>
291                      <tr>
292                        <th align="right">${LastDayCaption}</th>
293                        <td align="center"
294                            colspan="4">${Q1_LastDay}</td>
295                        <td align="center"
296                            colspan="4">${Q0_LastDay}</td>
297                      </tr>
298                      <tr><td colspan="9">&nbsp;</tr>
299                      <tr>
300                        <th align="right">${TotalCountCaption}</th>
301                        <td align="right"
302                            colspan="4">${Q1_TotalCount}</td>
303                        <td align="right"
304                            colspan="4">${Q0_TotalCount}</td>
305                      </tr>
306                      <tr>
307                        <th align="right">${TotalDaysCaption}</th>
308                        <td align="right"
309                            colspan="4">${Q1_TotalDays}</td>
310                        <td align="right"
311                            colspan="4">${Q0_TotalDays}</td>
312                      </tr>
313                      <tr>
314                        <th align="right">${DayCountCaption}</th>
315                        <td align="right"
316                            colspan="4">${Q1_DayCount}</td>
317                        <td align="right"
318                            colspan="4">${Q0_DayCount}</td>
319                      </tr>
320                      <tr><td colspan="9">&nbsp;</tr>
321                      <tr>
322                        <th/>
323                        <th>${TableHeader1}</th>
324                        <th>${TableHeader2}</th>
325                        <th>${TableHeader3}</th>
326                        <th>${TableHeader4}</th>
327                        <th>${TableHeader1}</th>
328                        <th>${TableHeader2}</th>
329                        <th>${TableHeader3}</th>
330                        <th>${TableHeader4}</th>
331                      </tr>
332                      <tr>
333                        <th align="right">${AverageCaption}</th>
334                        <td align="right">${Q1_AverageSystolic}</td>
335                        <td align="right">${Q1_AverageDiastolic}</td>
336                        <td align="right">${Q1_AveragePulsePressure}</td>
337                        <td>${Q1_AverageAssessment}</td>
338                        <td align="right">${Q0_AverageSystolic}</td>
339                        <td align="right">${Q0_AverageDiastolic}</td>
340                        <td align="right">${Q0_AveragePulsePressure}</td>
341                        <td>${Q0_AverageAssessment}</td>
342                      </tr>
343                      <tr>
344                        <th align="right">${WeightedAverageCaption}</th>
345                        <td align="right">${Q1_WeightedAverageSystolic}</td>
346                        <td align="right">${Q1_WeightedAverageDiastolic}</td>
347                        <td align="right">${Q1_WeightedAveragePulsePressure}</td>
348                        <td>${Q1_WeightedAverageAssessment}</td>
349                        <td align="right">${Q0_WeightedAverageSystolic}</td>
350                        <td align="right">${Q0_WeightedAverageDiastolic}</td>
351                        <td align="right">${Q0_WeightedAveragePulsePressure}</td>
352                        <td>${Q0_WeightedAverageAssessment}</td>
353                      </tr>
354                      <tr>
355                        <th align="right">${MedianCaption}</th>
356                        <td align="right">${Q1_MedianSystolic}</td>
357                        <td align="right">${Q1_MedianDiastolic}</td>
358                        <td align="right">${Q1_MedianPulsePressure}</td>
359                        <td>${Q1_MedianAssessment}</td>
360                        <td align="right">${Q0_MedianSystolic}</td>
361                        <td align="right">${Q0_MedianDiastolic}</td>
362                        <td align="right">${Q0_MedianPulsePressure}</td>
363                        <td>${Q0_MedianAssessment}</td>
364                      </tr>
365                      <tr>
366                        <td/>
367                        <td colspan="4">
368                          <div class="svg">${Q1_Chart}</div>
369                        </td>
370                        <td colspan="4">
371                          <div class="svg">${Q0_Chart}</div>
372                        </td>
373                      </tr>
374                    </tbody>
375                  </table>
376                  <br>
377                  <h2>${DistributionCaption}</h2>
378                  <table border = "1">
379                    <thead>
380                      <tr>
381                        <th width="20%"
382                            rowspan="2"/>
383                        <th width="40%"
384                            align="center"
385                            colspan="6">${Q1}</th>
386                        <th width="40%"
387                            align="center"
388                            colspan="6">${Q0}</th>
389                      </tr>
390                      <tr>
391                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn1Header}</th>
392                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn2Header}</th>
393                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn1Header}</th>
394                        <th colspan="3">${DistributionColumn2Header}</th>
395                      </tr>
396                    </thead>
397                    <tbody>
398                      <tr>
399                        <th>${Diag_LOW}</th>
400                        <td align="right">(&lt; 105)</td>
401                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_LOW_SystolicPercent}</td>
402                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_LOW_SystolicCount}</td>
403                        <td align="right">(&lt; 65)</td>
404                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_LOW_DiastolicPercent}</td>
405                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_LOW_DiastolicCount}</td>
406                        <td align="right">(&lt; 105)</td>
407                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_LOW_SystolicPercent}</td>
408                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_LOW_SystolicCount}</td>
409                        <td align="right">(&lt; 65)</td>
410                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_LOW_DiastolicPercent}</td>
411                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_LOW_DiastolicCount}</td>
412                      </tr>
413                      <tr>
414                        <th>${Diag_OPTIMAL}</th>
415                        <td align="right">(105-119)</td>
416                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
417                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
418                        <td align="right">(65-79)</td>
419                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
420                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
421                        <td align="right">(105-119)</td>
422                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
423                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_OPTIMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
424                        <td align="right">(65-79)</td>
425                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
426                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_OPTIMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
427                      </tr>
428                      <tr>
429                        <th>${Diag_NORMAL}</th>
430                        <td align="right">(120-129)</td>
431                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
432                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
433                        <td align="right">(80-84)</td>
434                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
435                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
436                        <td align="right">(120-129)</td>
437                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_SystolicPercent}</td>
438                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_SystolicCount}</td>
439                        <td align="right">(80-84)</td>
440                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicPercent}</td>
441                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_DiastolicCount}</td>
442                      </tr>
443                      <tr>
444                        <th>${Diag_NORMAL_HIGH}</th>
445                        <td align="right">(130-139)</td>
446                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicPercent}</td>
447                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicCount}</td>
448                        <td align="right">(85-89)</td>
449                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicPercent}</td>
450                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicCount}</td>
451                        <td align="right">(130-139)</td>
452                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicPercent}</td>
453                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_SystolicCount}</td>
454                        <td align="right">(85-89)</td>
455                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicPercent}</td>
456                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_NORMAL_HIGH_DiastolicCount}</td>
457                      </tr>
458                      <tr>
459                        <th>${Diag_HIGH1}</th>
460                        <td align="right">(140-159)</td>
461                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH1_SystolicPercent}</td>
462                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH1_SystolicCount}</td>
463                        <td align="right">(90-99)</td>
464                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicPercent}</td>
465                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicCount}</td>
466                        <td align="right">(140-159)</td>
467                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH1_SystolicPercent}</td>
468                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH1_SystolicCount}</td>
469                        <td align="right">(90-99)</td>
470                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicPercent}</td>
471                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH1_DiastolicCount}</td>
472                      </tr>
473                      <tr>
474                        <th>${Diag_HIGH2}</th>
475                        <td align="right">(160-179)</td>
476                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH2_SystolicPercent}</td>
477                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH2_SystolicCount}</td>
478                        <td align="right">(100-109)</td>
479                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicPercent}</td>
480                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicCount}</td>
481                        <td align="right">(160-179)</td>
482                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH2_SystolicPercent}</td>
483                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH2_SystolicCount}</td>
484                        <td align="right">(100-109)</td>
485                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicPercent}</td>
486                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH2_DiastolicCount}</td>
487                      </tr>
488                      <tr>
489                        <th>${Diag_HIGH3}</th>
490                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 180)</td>
491                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH3_SystolicPercent}</td>
492                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH3_SystolicCount}</td>
493                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 110)</td>
494                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicPercent}</td>
495                        <td align="right">${Q1_Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicCount}</td>
496                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 180)</td>
497                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH3_SystolicPercent}</td>
498                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH3_SystolicCount}</td>
499                        <td align="right">(&gt;= 110)</td>
500                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicPercent}</td>
501                        <td align="right">${Q0_Diag_HIGH3_DiastolicCount}</td>
502                      </tr>
503                    </tbody>
504                  </table>
505                  <br>
506                  <p>${Disclaimer}</p>
507                  </body>
508                </html>
509                """
510        );
511        writeString( targetFile, template.replaceVariable( contents ), UTF8 );
512    }   //  generateHTMLReport()
513}
514//  class CompareReport
515
516/*
517 *  End of File
518 */
